projects.name: Microservices Video to MP3 Converter
projects.description: Engineered a distributed system for converting video files to MP3 format using microservices architecture, implementing secure JWT user authentication, message queuing with RabbitMQ, scalable storage, and notifications.

projects.name: Kafka Confluent Cloud Pub-Sub
projects.description: Implemented Apache Kafka producers/consumers using Confluent Cloud with topic management and data serialization. Containerized a multi-language environment showcasing Kafka integration, demonstrating cross-platform compatibility.

projects.name: Classic To-Do List
projects.description: Developed a full-stack task manager web app with CRUD operations using React and Go, utilizing PostgreSQL for the database. Implemented GraphQL API for efficient data retrieval and deployed on AWS with a self-signed SSL certificate for HTTPS.

projects.name: Voice AI Interviewer Agent
projects.description: Engineered an AI-powered voice interviewer leveraging Groq for fast inference, Vapi for voice interactions, and implemented an evaluation system with custom metrics. Utilized Supabase for authentication and storage.

projects.name: Cloud-based Video Face Recognition App
projects.description: Designed a 3-tier hybrid cloud architecture leveraging AWS and OpenStack for integration of Web, App, and Data tiers. Prepared Python scripts for Lambda triggers, S3, and DynamoDB; auto-scaled 20 EC2 instances via SQS and Cloudwatch.
